name: Franklin 3D
description:
(please read the "important info" section)

After settling in to the new villages in Africa with the escaped farm animals, Franklin decides that he wants to found a private defense company to provide a defence to people. As a result, he embarks on a continent-trotting journey to seek Government Business Man, a man who can grant him a business license. Along the way, he meets many other people, some good and some bad. It soon  becomes apparent that someone is out to stop him, but Franklin must do all that he can.

Franklin 3D is a platformer  as well as a first person shooter.

Controls:

WASD for directional movement

Use the mouse to move around the camera

Use left shift to dash

Space to jump

Important info

Pressing "Load Game" will load the previous scene you were in before. The scenes autosave themselves, but all of your progress within the level will be gone.

Pressing the tab key will bring up the pause menu.

This game was ported down to browser, so keep in mind that the browser may be a lesser version of the downloadable version (it is recommended that you download the game to get the intended expereince).

Use fullscreen when playing in the browser.

The quit and saving features have been taken out of the browser version.

Bugs and Versions:

Franklin 3D Beta- Beta version (June 20, 2020)

Franklin 3D Windows 1.0- Launch Day build (June 29, 2020)

Franklin 3D Linux 1.0- Launch Day build (June 29, 2020)

News:

The web version of the game has been delayed indefinitely (June 29, 2020)

franklin 3D is the last mainline franklin game for the forseeable future.
